description:
New! An addictive puzzle game!
Only in the App Store!

RULES OF THE GAME
Each feature in the game has a numeric value.
Arrange chips on free squares of the game board according to the rules:
  - On the adjacent cells are no other chips;
  - One of the chips in the adjacent cell is greater than 1 or less than 1.

Nearby cells is adjacent cells vertically and horizontally.
The chip is mounted on the board can not move!

Hints in the game:
  - A black circle with the number on the counter, the total number of chips in play.
  - The white circle with the number on the counter, the remaining number of chips.
  - Sight-best place to install the chips.

The chip is removed from the game if all the neighboring cells are occupied.
If the number of chips coincides with the layouts of the device, the coin will be.
At the end of the game coins credited to your account.

Coin-free game currency in the game.
Use the coins you can open the following levels.
In the absence of the required number of coins in your account the game ends.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Studiofant1

Program is written on "smart BASIC" for iOS programming language and is published in App Store using "smart BASIC" SDK for Xcode.
